subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-gaŋ||hill, ridge, mountain}} (STEDT, {{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}), cognate with {{cog|bo|tr=sgang}}, {{cog|my|tr=khaŋ|t=hill, knoll}}, {{cog|my|tr=khoŋ|t=summit}}, {{cog|lhu|qhɔ³³||mountain}}, {{cog|suv|gɹaŋ³³||mountain}}, Proto-{{w|Tamangic languages|Tamangic}} *''ᴬgaŋ'' ("hill, mountain").

STEDT also proposes cognacy with {{och-l|[[京]]|artificial mound, capital}} and {{och-l|[[鯨]]|whale}}.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|奧勒岡州|山岡|岡岑|岡巒|岡渡拉|岡連嶺屬|岡陵|崑岡|梵蒂岡|瀧岡|臥龍岡|雲岡|雲岡石窟|靜岡|高岡|高岡兒|鶴岡|黃花岡|黃岡}}
